NEWS ROUNDUP

Russia: US basketball star Brittney Griner pleads guilty to drug charges

US gold medal Olympian Brittney Griner is on trial in Russia after police allegedly found cannabis vape canisters in her luggage. The basketball star said she had no intention of breaking the law.  

'The Godfather' star James Caan dies at 82

Actor James Caan, best known for his role of impulsive mafioso Sonny Corleone in the first Godfather movie, has passed away at the age of 82.  

Scientists find giant dinosaur Meraxes Gigas

The newly discovered carnivorous dinosaur had a massive head and tiny arms, similar to the famous T. rex.  

MEPs vote to urge EU to enshrine abortion right

The vote is a reaction to the US Supreme Court's overturning of Roe v. Wade.  

Yu-Gi-Oh creator Kazuki Takahashi found dead in Japan

The Japanese artist created an internationally popular manga series that bore a media franchise  

A CLOSER LOOK

Villagers in DR Congo live in fear of M23

The DRC's government says Rwanda is seeking to cause instability to be able to exploit the region's mineral riches.  

Germany to make life easier for thousands of immigrants

The government has begun to overhaul Germany's immigration system to allow more migrants to stay in the country.  

Indonesia juggles Russia, Ukraine and the West

With its traditions of neutrality and nonalignment, Indonesia has had to tiptoe around the Ukraine war debate.
